ygData.subject: RE: EQ and Laptops
ygData.msgSnippet: I ll let you guys know soon about the laptops...or at least ONE laptop...I am getting ready to make a roadtrip for work, and I am going to try and configure a
ygData.messageBody:
I'll let you guys know soon about the laptops...or at least ONE laptop...I
am getting ready to make a roadtrip for work, and I am going to try and
configure a Sony slimline laptop for EQ and see if it works.
Its the graphics acceleration that's the key, and to tell you the truth I
don't remember what kind of graphics card this rig has....guess I'll find
out :)


-----Original Message-----
From: MFerrulo@... [mailto:MFerrulo@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 04, 1999 11:05 AM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: [EQCheats] EQ and Laptops


From: MFerrulo@...


I am going on the road for 2 weeks and may get a laptop so I can play while
travelling. Anyone ever see a EQ played on Laptop? Is it possible? Any
advice as to what kind of not to expensive laptop to get?

I do not expect the performance of my desk top - just something playable :)

Wizaro WrathCaster
Solusek Ro
